price: Na ni wa Mwenyezi Mungu ufalme wa mbingu na ardhi, na kwa Mwenyezi Mungu ndio marejeo ya wote.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
footnotes: Na Mwenyezi Mungu peke yake ndiye Mwenye kumiliki mbingu na ardhi na viliomo ndani yao, na ndiye Mwenye madaraka juu yao, na wote watarejea kwake Siku ya Kiyama kwa ajili ya hisabu na malipo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa-ilā al-lahi al-maṣīru
